physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 10 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#76 Dr. Charles Spivak, co-founder of JCRS''.

mods.abstract: Formal head and shoulders portrait of Denver physician Dr. Charles Spivak, who served as executive secretary of the Jewish Consumptives Relief Society from 1904 until his death in 1927.
mods.note: Accession # 1271, Donated by AMC Cancer Research Center as part of the JCRS Records.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
